com.nandox.jop.core.context

Class WebAppContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nandox.jop.core.context.WebAppContext

  • public class WebAppContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Application Context to resolve and invoke bean.

    The bean is search in spring environment

    Author:
    Fernando Costantino
